channel.title: Orange on Text Mining for Information Professionals
channel.description: Recent content in Orange on Text Mining for Information Professionals

item.title: Clustering
item.description: About Chapter 1: The Computational Library covers the case study on Clustering of Documents using Two Different Tools. It is divided into two parts: 1A, and 1B. 1A case study uses Orange tool whereas 1B case study uses R programming language to perform clustering. How to Cite Please cite this compendium as: Lamba, Manika, & Madhusudhan, Margam. (2021). Clustering of Documents using Two Different Tools (Version 1.
